attributes.action: Give students a refund on university tuition fees
attributes.additional_details: People are receiving government support through lockdown. Workers are receiving financial support for lost employment opportunites while students are still paying in full to only receive a reduced university experience. It would be fairer to reduces the tuition costs.
attributes.background: Government/ universities to refund at least half of tuition fees being charged to students due to reduced value of university experience from lectures being cancelled and cheaper cost of delivering courses online.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
